original:
Recent technological advancements in Earth observation from space have led to the emergence of a new field of phenological research. This discipline focuses on the study of the phenology of entire ecosystems and vegetation stands on a global scale through proxy methods. These approaches serve to complement traditional phenological methods, which primarily recorded the first occurrences of individual species and their phenophases.
